official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 96-432 relating to the United States Capitol Grounds to authorize additional funds for the acquisition of property for addition to the United States Capitol Grounds and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends a specified Act relating to the United States Capitol Grounds to authorize additional funds for the acquisition of property for addition to the United States Capitol Grounds.
